title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Skills: Mathematics Problem-Solving Using GeoGebra Classroom

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can visualize and analyze complex math problems using interactive tools in GeoGebra Classroom.
Learners can identify errors in problem-solving processes through formative assessments and develop correction strategies.
Learners can achieve over 80% accuracy while performing problem-solving tasks at various cognitive levels.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
